document_data.mainbody:
he Seaspray Inn was an inn in the town of Highcastle on the Sword Coast North in the late 14 century DR. The town was the largest port settlement near the Crossroad Keep, and as such attracted a healthy amount of naval vessels and merchant ships.
Circa the , the establishment was popular among locals as well as sailors whose ships docked at Highcastle. It offered food, drinks, and lodgings to locals, guests, and passing adventurers.
